line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): removed player code)
* LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code; Consider adding CCDS to ADS
* Get setup
* do if $bomber
* $missile.fire.probability = 1
* write to log file $page.id append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%sAutorename: %s Bomber: %s', $debuginfo, $autorename, $bomber, null, null
* Security precaution: Remove ships from any old wings and formations
* Purge used name list: remove names, if there is no corresponding wing found; naming of wings only usefull for player, as names of wings of other races will not be desplayed anyway
* if $autorename
* Assign names from global array to variables
* Create a random wing name, which is not already used
* end
* Creating a new wing with custom names
* Find a leader, start long range missile combat
* NPC rearm leader with missiles and drones for free
* If missile defence mosquito is installed, all three requirements are present (Fight Command Software MK1, MK2 and Mosquito or Poltergeist missile), start convoy missile defence on leader ship
*if get global variable: name='missile.defense.mosquito.version'
*if not $leader-> is task 10 in use
*$leader-> begin task 10 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main.convoy' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
*else if not $leader-> is task 11 in use
*$leader-> begin task 11 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main.convoy' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
*end
*end
* Memory original leader name, rename leader
* If wing size is adjusted to ALL, or the number of available ships is smaler than wanted wing size, set wing size to number of all available fighters
* If number of avalilable ships is greater than the wanted number of ships in the wing, resize array to given wing size
* Create wing ship names, only usefull for player owned wings
* Setup wing
* Rearm NPC ships with missiles and drones for free
* Store old shipname for renaming after defend task has been cmpleted, rename wing ships
* Add ship to flight wing and to formation
* If missile defence mosquito is installed, and either task 10 or 11 is free, start missile defence on wing ship
*if get global variable: name='missile.defense.mosquito.version'
*if not $ship-> is task 10 in use
*$ship-> begin task 10 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
*else if not $ship-> is task 11 in use
*$ship-> begin task 11 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
*end
*end
* Set wing parameters
* Copy race relations form THIS to all active ships
* write to log file $page.id append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%s$wing.name: %s $leader.name: %s $wingmate.names: %s', $info, $wing.name, $leader.name, $wingmate.names, null
* Reset shields to 100%
* Start long range missile combat (complicated search is necessary to prevent having multiple long range combat tasks running)
* Start hullcheck
* Remove any MDM missile from compatible missile array
* Refuel energy cells, in case ship has a jumpdrive aboard
* How much volume is occupied by missiles?
* Add two missile types, target percents of cargo bay to be filled up with missiles: Missile boats 60% - 80%, all other ships 10-16%; calculate limits of volume percent to be filled up with missiles
* If missiles do not fill up cargo bay up to desired fill limits, refill ship with missiles
* Add MDM missiles
* Add drones (max 80 drones, or max 25% of remaining free space)

sval.val: ACC.Build.Wing
%sAutorename: %s
%sWingname: %s, part one: %s, part two: %s
%s$wing.size: %s Available ship number: %s
%s$wing.size: %s Ship array: %s
%sWingmate name: %s created
%s$wing: %s
LU Update (Solarahawk): removed player code)
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled MDM code; Consider adding CCDS to ADS
Get setup
do if $bomber
$missile.fire.probability = 1
write to log file $page.id append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%sAutorename: %s Bomber: %s', $debuginfo, $autorename, $bomber, null, null
Security precaution: Remove ships from any old wings and formations
Purge used name list: remove names, if there is no corresponding wing found; naming of wings only usefull for player, as names of wings of other races will not be desplayed anyway
if $autorename
Assign names from global array to variables
Create a random wing name, which is not already used
Creating a new wing with custom names
Find a leader, start long range missile combat
NPC rearm leader with missiles and drones for free
If missile defence mosquito is installed, all three requirements are present (Fight Command Software MK1, MK2 and Mosquito or Poltergeist missile), start convoy missile defence on leader ship
if get global variable: name='missile.defense.mosquito.version'
if not $leader-> is task 10 in use
$leader-> begin task 10 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main.convoy' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
else if not $leader-> is task 11 in use
$leader-> begin task 11 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main.convoy' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
Memory original leader name, rename leader
If wing size is adjusted to ALL, or the number of available ships is smaler than wanted wing size, set wing size to number of all available fighters
If number of avalilable ships is greater than the wanted number of ships in the wing, resize array to given wing size
Create wing ship names, only usefull for player owned wings
Setup wing
Rearm NPC ships with missiles and drones for free
Store old shipname for renaming after defend task has been cmpleted, rename wing ships
Add ship to flight wing and to formation
If missile defence mosquito is installed, and either task 10 or 11 is free, start missile defence on wing ship
if get global variable: name='missile.defense.mosquito.version'
if not $ship-> is task 10 in use
$ship-> begin task 10 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
else if not $ship-> is task 11 in use
$ship-> begin task 11 with script 'anarkis.ads.missile.def.main' and priority 0: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
Set wing parameters
Copy race relations form THIS to all active ships
write to log file $page.id append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='%s$wing.name: %s $leader.name: %s $wingmate.names: %s', $info, $wing.name, $leader.name, $wingmate.names, null
Reset shields to 100%
Start long range missile combat (complicated search is necessary to prevent having multiple long range combat tasks running)
Start hullcheck
Remove any MDM missile from compatible missile array
Refuel energy cells, in case ship has a jumpdrive aboard
How much volume is occupied by missiles?
Add two missile types, target percents of cargo bay to be filled up with missiles: Missile boats 60% - 80%, all other ships 10-16%; calculate limits of volume percent to be filled up with missiles
If missiles do not fill up cargo bay up to desired fill limits, refill ship with missiles
Add MDM missiles
Add drones (max 80 drones, or max 25% of remaining free space)
